mdRecord.dcterms:title: Carrel 4-7, west wall

mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Drugs. Nietzsche misspelled with date. German phrase translating to "Work please." Partially legible string of invective (not transcribed because not completely readable), with response. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
The text within this image may be offensive to some.
I LOVE ACID !! :) | Neitzsche 4/13/09 | Arbeit Bitte | Remember me |
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Drugs
Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm, 1844-1900
Invective
